title: KISHOR KUMAR K NAZARE
text: Overall, it is a good app to use and manage a portfolio. I have been using it for the past 2 years, I think. An improvement I'd like to mention is in the mutual funds returns we should have an option to see the XIRR while going through the existing available mf instead of only returns over past 1,3,5 years returns. that would help select a mf that performs consistently. This can be made available only for funds active for more than 3 years, so that mf fairly new are not impacted.
author: KISHOR KUMAR K NAZARE
